mapper.insert: insert into t_provider (company_name,contact_id,contact_start_date,contact_end_date,is_contact_extension,company_address,permit_number business_people,business_people_card_id,source,is_taxpayer,manage_method,company_introduce,created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, removed) values (#{companyName},#{contactId},#{contactStartDate},#{contactEndDate},#{isContactExtension},#{companyAddress}, #{permitNumber},#{businessPeople},#{businessPeopleCardId},#{source},#{isTaxpayer},#{manageMethod},#{companyIntroduce}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedTime}, #{removed})

insert into t_provider_contact (contact_type,contact_name,contact_phone,contact_wechat,contact_dingding,created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, removed) values
(#{information.contactType},#{information.contactName},#{information.contactPhone},#{information.contactDingding},{information.createdBy}, #{information.createdTime}, #{information.updatedBy}, #{information.updatedTime}, #{information.removed})
